thread.title: Microsoft Announces Increase in Quarterly Dividend
thread.title_full: Microsoft Announces Increase in Quarterly Dividend

author: PRNW
title: Microsoft Announces Increase in Quarterly Dividend
text:
REDMOND, Wash. , Sept. 15, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Microsoft Corp. today announced that its board of directors declared a quarterly dividend of $0.36 per share, reflecting a five cent increase, or 16.1 percent, over the previous quarter's dividend. The dividend is payable December 10, 2015 to shareholders of record on November 19 , 2015. The ex-dividend date will be November 17 , 2015.
Microsoft (Nasdaq "MSFT" @microsoft) is the leading platform and productivity company for the mobile-first, cloud-first world and its mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more.
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20000822/MSFTLOGO
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/microsoft-announces-increase-in-quarterly-dividend-300143597.html
SOURCE Microsoft Corp.
